name: Alkeris-SR 200 mg tablets
description: Acelofenac belongs to a group of medicines known as non-steroidal anti-inflammatory medicines (NSAIDs). This medicine is used in the management of osteoarthritis (bone and joint disease), rheumatoid arthritis (joints inflammation) and ankylosing spondylitis (spinal arthritis). This tablet works by blocking the activity of the enzyme that causes swelling, pain and joint stiffness.
label: medicine
